title: So Many Bunnies: A Bedtime ABC and Counting Book
description: A sweet, rhyming, bunny-led introduction to ABCs and 123s! Little ones can count along with Mother Rabbit through her rambling house and garden as she tucks in a whole alphabet of baby bunnies, from Abel through Zed. This cozy bedtime book has the comforting familiarity of a lullaby combined with the basic concepts toddlers enjoy exploring. Rick Walton and Paige Miglioâ€™s sweet tale has charmed readers throughout the years. This board book edition is perfect for small hands.
author: Rick Walton
